message: Is there any way to set it from a command / function?
:set paste? etc displays a status in this line
Also, I do not mean the "statusline"
Sorry, I should clarify, I want to put my own text (output from a shell program) in this line; the ":set paste?" was to try to help identify which area I was asking about
But only if you are inside insert mode. if you are in visual or normal mode it displays nothing
I generally user map F3 <Esc>:set pastetoggle<CR>
Found it; just needed to strip the newline characters when using echo
